abstract: The United States's hugely expensive, often inhumane measures to combat illegal immigration do not work. Those drones we use in Pakistan fly over the Mexican border. Arizona lawmakers want to deploy armed militias. A proposed state scheme envisions 'red alerts' for people living within 62 miles of Mexico. (I don't understand it, either.)

headline.main: That Fence Keeps Them Out, But Also Keeps Us In
